name: Christie Reed
text: This Pizza Hut has crayons and coloring books for the kiddos! A definite plus in my book! The service was fast and the food was yummy. We will for sure be driving past other Pizza Huts to come here again.

name: Mike Jacob
text: Food and service is excellent 👌

name: Wallace Joseph
text: I eat here a lot since I work close by. I have to say their service is always good and they keep the spot well kept consistently. Rates are fair and they serve sizeable portions.

name: Dan Stant
text: Horrible buffet wouldn't suggest it to anyone same cold pizza that no one wanted for over an hour they weren't bringing any out till someone ate it but it was cold when we got there and over an hour later same few pieces were still there. Even the cold cinnamon sticks wouldn't melt the icing.

text: Food is good and so is the service. One thing a lot of people don't realize is restaurants like Pizza Hut don't have a lot of help. It's bad service if people don't care to do anything and tell you to get out for no reason. Whether you like …More

text: The service was awful. Had to ask multiple times for our drinks, and when we needed refills. The buffet was poorly ran as there was hardly ever anything on the buffet. The waitress done nothing but walk around talking to people she knew and …More

text: Walked in today.  3 people behind the counter.  No one said one word.  Walked up to counter still waiting to be seated.  No one said hi nothing turned and walked to back of store.  Needless to say we left.

text: Being from Fort Wayne In. I expect a lot from PIzza hut but the garlic knots were fire. However pizza was a little greasy. Will def deliver vs dine in next time

text: Called and was put on hold for 7 minutes. Hung up and recalled 2 more times and was on hold for 5minutes. We finally just gave up and went somewhere else.

text: Wonderful! This establishment has been the best pizza Hut I've been to. The bathrooms are always clean the food is always fresh. Thanks! I recommend the mild wings (bone in).

text: The best buffet ever! When ever we're in town this is our spot. Everyone is nice and the stuffed crust is they're best line! Still great

name: Mike Leiss
text: Pizza is great, service is good, and there is plenty of dine-in space available. Perfect for a family night out.

name: Sydney Williams
text: Answer your phones! Why do you guys still even offer delivery when you refuse to do it?! Ridiculous. If I could give you zero stars I would. Can’t rate the way someone does their job when they don’t do their job!!

name: Andrew Storer
text: This pizza hut is one of the greatest ones I have ever been too it's fast and friendly service with a smile on the employees faces I would highly recommend going there anytime especially during the buffet it's a great deal for the quality of pizza you get and you can't get that anywhere else in town period!!!!

name: Haven Hubble Film
text: I got a half fiesta beef taco half bbq backyard chicken and it so good I had to order it thrice. So good num num yum yum tum tum so good stellar spectacular lip smacking Schmidt good. If you're looking for a place to go, I'll won't hesitate …More

text: Just had a carryout order! Everything wast fast, tasted amazing, and plus i added on extra things at the carryout window and they told me not to worry about it :) excellent food and customer service !
